speaker: BASTARD
text:
Now
              ,
               
              by
               
              my
               
              life
              ,
               
              this
               
              day
               
              grows
               
              wondrous
               
              hot
              .

speaker: BASTARD
text:
Some
               
              airy
               
              devil
               
              hovers
               
              in
               
              the
               
              sky

speaker: BASTARD
text:
And
               
              pours
               
              down
               
              mischief
              .
               
              Austria’s
               
              head
               
              lie
               
              there
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              JOHN
text:
Hubert
              ,
               
              keep
               
              this
               
              boy
              .
              —
              Philip
              ,
               
              make
               
              up
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              JOHN
text:
My
               
              mother
               
              is
               
              assailèd
               
              in
               
              our
               
              tent

speaker: BASTARD
text:
Her
               
              Highness
               
              is
               
              in
               
              safety
              ,
               
              fear
               
              you
               
              not
              .

speaker: BASTARD
text:
But
               
              on
              ,
               
              my
               
              liege
              ,
               
              for
               
              very
               
              little
               
              pains

speaker: BASTARD
text:
Will
               
              bring
               
              this
               
              labor
               
              to
               
              an
               
              happy
               
              end
              .
